briefTitle: Young and Strong: An Education and Supportive Care Intervention Study for Young Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Young and Strong: An Education and Supportive Care Intervention Study for Young Women With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of attention rates in the YWI and the PAI
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female age 18-45 years at diagnosis
* Within 3 months of stage I-III invasive breast cancer diagnosis
* No known recurrence of breast cancer or metastatic breast cancer
* Able to read and write in English
* Has first appointment with medical oncologist after the provider's practice is enrolled in the study
